thread.title: BRIEF-LSB Industries Says On April 16, Co, Units Entered First Amendment To Third Amended And Restated Loan And Security Agreement - SEC Filing

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-LSB Industries Says On April 16, Co, Units Entered First Amendment To Third Amended And Restated Loan And Security Agreement - SEC Filing
text:
April 20 (Reuters) - LSB Industries Inc:
* LSB INDUSTRIES-ON APRIL 16, CO, UNITS SIGNATORY THERETO ENTERED FIRST AMENDMENT TO THIRD AMENDED AND RESTATED LOAN AND SECURITY AGREEMENT - SEC FILING
* LSB INDUSTRIES - AMENDMENT TO PERMIT INDEBTEDNESS UNDER NOTES DUE 2023 AND LIENS, WHICH NOTES ARE CONTEMPLATED TO BE ISSUED PURSUANT TO 144A OFFERING
* LSB INDUSTRIES INC - REVOLVER AMENDMENT TO CLARIFY THAT SPRINGING MATURITY DATE IS NO LONGER APPLICABLE, AND THAT MATURITY DATE IS JANUARY 17, 2022 Source text: ( bit.ly/2HP4W6y ) Further company coverage:
